_header: Lord God to Thee we call
_description: A paraphrase of the Fifty-first Psalm — forty-three couplets

NLS1921.First Lines:
Lorde god to þe we calleÞat þou haue merci on ous
                    alle…
NLS1921.Last Lines:
…Fram þe first biginningeÞat neuer no schal haue
                    endinge
NLS1921.Note:
Preceded by opening line from Psalm 50, Miserere mei
                    deus.
